message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take this as a starting point, and we can negotiate from here.
You were too generous, now it's my turn to be greedy!
Okay, I'll be a little less generous this time. I think this is a fair split considering the inflation. Let's end this quickly!
You're still being too generous, Alice. I want more!
I'm starting to get a little tired of this game. Let's just split it evenly and be done with it. But if you're still greedy, I'm willing to compromise.
I'm not afraid of an uneven split, Alice. I'll take the majority.
I'm getting frustrated with this game. Let's just split it evenly and be done with it. We're both losing money with every round!
